google.description: Col McCann becomes a local hero when he saves a boy from drowning but when his older brother is suspected of a serious crime, Col must decide if he should be loyal to his family or tell the truth about what he saw while under the water. Jr Lib Guild. Reprint.
google.title: Dark Waters
